dc:title: Fall Appeal - October 1960
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Says they are "broke again and are beggars." Lists their expenses and improvements that were needed in city and farm on Staten Island. Recalls Saints Paul, Joseph ("the householder"), Francis, and Therese.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 772 1960-10-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
